# Pipes of Sounding
## Overview
**Aura** faint illusion; **CL** 2nd

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 1,800 gp

**Weight** 3 lbs.

**Description**

When played by a character who has the [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] (wind instruments) skill, these shiny metallic pan pipes create a variety of sounds. The figment sounds are the equivalent of *[[Ghost Sound (Spell)|ghost sound]].*

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Ghost Sound (Spell)|ghost sound]]*

**Cost** 900 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 526
